I noted that the School had five (5) pieces of land recorded in the assets register that have never been valued to ascertain the monetary value. I also noted that the land in Kireka had squatters and the possibility of reclaiming it may prove to be challenging. The encroachment on the School land was attributed to failure to gazette and develop the land. 
